Prescribe.definition: to claim title or a right to something
Prescribe.origin: [a precarious possessor cannot against the owner]

1.definition: to lay down as a rule or guidespecify with authority [the times, places and manner of holding elections for Senators and Representatives, shall bein each State by the legislature thereof "art. I"]
1.prescribed: in each State by the legislature thereof "

2.definition: to invalidate or bar the enforcement of by prescription [this claim for damages shall not beso long as the minor's right of action exists against his tutor ""]
2.prescribed: so long as the minor's right of action exists against his tutor "
